BRANCH.COMMENT: Only deal with files, where source is specified

INVOKE.NAME: support
INVOKE.COMMENT: copy support file to build dir

INVOKE.NAME: product
INVOKE.COMMENT: copy product specific file to build dir

INVOKE.NAME: properties
INVOKE.COMMENT: copy properties to build dir, unless already present (may have already generated one dynamically!!)

MAP.NAME: config
MAP.COMMENT: Don't need to copy, but must complete source path

MAP.NAME: source
MAP.COMMENT: Nothing to do, file already in place, thanks to git

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: copy by default, but if it fails, assume already in resources dir

INVOKE.COMMENT: try to copy based on file type to build dir

MAP.COMMENT: set path to /resources dir (assume already copied b4)

BRANCH.COMMENT: if we have explicit files to copy as part of build, flag docker file not to copy /opt/softwareag
check if file is a shell script, if so specify chmod in dockerfile

MAP.NAME: /^*\.sh$/
MAP.COMMENT: target includes filename, so specify it as arg for chmod

MAP.NAME: $default
MAP.COMMENT: target doesn't include filename, so append source
filter out all invalid build commands i.e. no source or target specified
